Official websites use .gov

Secure .gov websites use HTTPS
A lock ( ) or https:// means you've safely connected to the .gov website. Share sensitive information only on official, secure websites.

Integrated Health Care System

SimLEARN is pioneering health care transformation within the VA by empowering providers with immersive, simulation-based training to enhance patient safety and deliver exceptional care to Veterans.

Transforming VA Health Care with SimLEARN

Simulation-based training for safer, high-quality care for Veterans

Simulation Learning, Evaluation, Assessment, and Research Network (SimLEARN) is pioneering health care transformation through simulation-based training across the largest integrated health system in the U.S. Our mission is to shape VA into a High Reliability Organization (HRO) where patient safety is a top priority, and medical errors are minimized.

SimLEARN provides cutting-edge simulation curricula allowing health care professionals to practice critical diagnostic, procedural, and communication skills by recreating real-world clinical scenarios in a safe, controlled environment.

Through immersive experiences such as nurses running code team simulations and surgeons rehearsing in virtual reality, SimLEARN equips providers with decision-making abilities and muscle memory to deliver higher-quality care without putting patients at risk. SimLEARN is advancing innovative simulation methodologies to improve clinical performance, reduce errors, and ensure the best possible outcomes for Veterans.

SimVET

Simulation Validation, Evaluation, and Testing

SimVET empowers Veterans Health Administration modernization by ensuring the safe integration and testing of cutting-edge health care technologies before deployment, enhancing care and reducing risks.

REdI

Resuscitation Education and Innovation

REdI drives excellence in resuscitation education across VHA by providing standardized training, enhancing team performance, and supporting local facilities with quality improvement through simulation-based assessments.

LM

Learning Management

Learning Management advances VA’s clinical simulation training through the SLICE Network, delivering innovative, cost-effective educational solutions that improve Veteran health outcomes and reduce clinician time away from care.

ACO

Assessment, Collaboration and Outreach

Assessment, Collaboration, and Outreach (ACO) enhances Veteran care by using simulation-based training and best practices to optimize resources, support hospital activations, and drive innovation across VHA.

CTE

Clinical Training and Engagement

Clinical Training and Engagement (CTE) delivers expert simulation training and fosters interprofessional collaboration to improve clinical practice, enhance Veteran safety, and support VHA initiatives.

SO

Support Operations

Support Operations is the backbone of SimLEARN, managing activity coordination, equipment safety, and facility operations to ensure a seamless and safe environment for training and events.

We’re here anytime, day or night - 24/7

If you are a Veteran in crisis or concerned about one, connect with our caring, qualified responders for confidential help. Many of them are Veterans themselves.

  • Call 1-800-273-8255 and press 1
  • Text to 838255
  • Chat confidentially now
  • Call TTY if you have hearing loss 1-800-799-4889

Get more resources at VeteransCrisisLine.net.
